TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityException extends System.Exception
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityException extends System.SystemException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SecurityException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 在检测到安全性错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a security error is detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用方没有访问资源所需的权限，则会引发异常。A exception is thrown when a caller does not have the permissions required to access a resource. 下面的示例实例化一个 对象，该对象包含一个 对象，以允许访问 UI 对象和剪贴板，以及一个 对象来防止注册表访问。The following example instantiates a object that includes a object to allow access to UI objects and the Clipboard and a object to prevent registry access. 对方法的调用 表示无论分配给调用方的权限如何，都将应用这些权限。The call to the method means that these permissions will apply regardless of the permissions assigned to the caller. 因此，尝试创建一个注册表项会引发 。As a result, the attempt to create a registry key throws a . [!code-csharp[System.SecurityException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.securityexception.class/cs/se_ex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.SecurityException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.securityexception.class/vb/se_ex1.vb#1)] 使用 HRESULT COR_E_SECURITY，其值为0x8013150A。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_SECURITY, which has the value 0x8013150A. 有关类的实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见特定 构造函数。For a list of the initial property values for an instance of the class, see a specific constructor.

param.span: 如果 参数不为 ，则当前异常将在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |propertiesProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.| ## Examples 有关使用 构造函数的示例，请参阅为构造函数提供的示例 。For an example of the use of a constructor, see the example provided for the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction Action { System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置导致异常的安全操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the security action that caused the exception.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含导致安全检查失败的安全操作。The property contains the security action that caused the security check failure. 许多安全操作都可能导致引发安全异常。Many of the security actions can cause a security exception to be thrown. 例如，对权限集的需求检查调用堆栈上的所有调用方在权限集中是否有必要的权限。For example, a demand on a permission set checks that all callers on the call stack have the necessary permissions in the permission set. 如果调用堆栈上的任何调用方缺少所需的权限，则安全检查将失败。If any caller on the call stack lacks a required permission, the security check fails. 或者，调用链中的方法可以通过在堆栈上放置堆栈审核修饰符（如或）来修改堆栈审核的结果， 以限制允许的权限。Alternatively, a method in the call chain can modify the outcome of the stack walk by placing a stack walk modifier, such as or , on the stack to limit the allowed permissions. 例如，调用堆栈上的方法可能会拒绝其所有调用方一组名为 PSET1 的权限，以便对属于 PSET1 的权限的任何请求都对这些调用方失败。For example, a method on the call stack might deny all of its callers a set of permissions named PSET1, such that any demand for a permission that is part of PSET1 fails for those callers. 属性包含导致引发异常的安全操作。The property contains the security action that caused the exception to be thrown. 是命名空间中的一个枚举 ，它提供属性的安全操作值 。 is an enumeration in the namespace that provides the security action value for the property. 通常，此属性包含下表中显示的值之一。Typically this property contains one of the values shown in the following table. |安全操作Security action|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||由于对由属性标识的程序集发出了请求，完全堆栈遍历失败 。A full stack walk failed due to a demand made against the assembly identified by the property.| ||对由属性标识的程序集的链接要求 失败。A link demand against the assembly identified by the property failed.| ||由属性标识的程序集 未能满足继承要求。An assembly identified by the property failed to meet an inheritance demand.| ||要求的权限与权限集中的任何权限都不匹配 。A demanded permission did not match any permission in the permission set. 放置 在调用堆栈上的方法由 属性标识。The method that placed the on the call stack is identified by the property.| ||要求的权限与调用堆栈上的 deny 权限集中的权限匹配。A demanded permission matched a permission in the deny permission set on the call stack. 放置 在调用堆栈上的方法由 属性标识。The method that placed the on the call stack is identified by the property.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Demanded { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Demanded : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置未通过验证的所需的安全权限、权限集或权限集的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the demanded security permission, permission set, or permission set collection that failed.

value.span: 权限、权限集或权限集的集合对象。

span.span: A permission, permission set, or permission set collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于返回的权限集或权限集集合，返回的对象包含所有要求的权限，其中一个或多个权限导致了失败。In the case of a returned permission set or permission set collection, the returned object contains all the demanded permissions, one or more of which caused the failure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用属性来显示失败的要求的安全权限、权限集或权限集集合。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the demanded security permission, permission set, or permission set collection that failed. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DenySetInstance { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.DenySetInstance : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置导致请求失败的被拒绝安全权限、权限集或权限集的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the denied security permission, permission set, or permission set collection that caused a demand to fail.

value.span: 权限、权限集或权限集的集合对象。

span.span: A permission, permission set, or permission set collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含拒绝的权限、权限集或权限集集合，导致安全检查失败。This property contains the denied permission, permission set, or permission set collection that caused the security check to fail. 它 `null` 适用于不是由 Deny 导致的异常。It is `null` for exceptions that are not caused by a Deny. 属性的类型为 ，因为它可以包含权限、权限集或权限集集合。The property is of type because it can contain a permission, a permission set, or a permission set collection. 若要测试此属性的运行时类型，可以使用 方法或特定语言运算符，如 c # 中的 [is 运算符](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/is) 或 Visual Basic 中的 [TypeOf 运算符](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/typeof-operator) 。To test the run-time type of this property, you can use the method or a specific language operator, such as the [is operator](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/is) in C# or the [TypeOf operator](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/typeof-operator) in Visual Basic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Reflection::AssemblyName ^ FailedAssemblyInfo { System::Reflection::AssemblyName ^ get(); void set(System::Reflection::AssemblyName ^ value); };
member this.FailedAssemblyInfo : System.Reflection.AssemblyName with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置关于失败的程序集的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the failed assembly.

value.span: 一个 ，用于标识失败的程序集。

span.span: An that identifies the failed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含一个 对象，该对象标识导致安全检查失败的程序集。This property contains an object that identifies the assembly that caused the security check to fail. > [!NOTE] > 如果或堆栈帧中发生安全异常，则不会填充此属性 ，因为发出 或安全操作的程序集 不是堆栈审核失败的程序集。This property is not populated when a security exception occurs in a or stack frame, because the assembly issuing the or security action is not the assembly that failed the stack walk. 在这些情况下，将使用不需要程序集名称的构造函数、授予的设置信息或拒绝的设置信息来创建安全异常。In these cases, the security exception is created with a constructor that does not require an assembly name, granted set information, or refused set information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用属性来显示有关失败的程序集的信息。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the information about the failed assembly. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#12)]

summary.span: 获取或设置权限集中的第一个权限或者导致要求失败的权限集集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the first permission in a permission set or permission set collection that failed the demand.

value.span: 表示失败的第一个权限的 对象。

span.span: An object representing the first permission that failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求的对象是权限集或权限集集合，则 只表示导致异常的第一个权限。If the demanded object is a permission set or permission set collection, the represents only the first permission that caused the exception. 集或集合中的其他权限也可能导致请求失败。Additional permissions in the set or collection can also cause a demand failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetObjectData` 会设置 ，对所有异常对象数据进行序列化。`GetObjectData` sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在反序列化期间，将从通过流传输的 `SerializationInfo` 中重新构造异常。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the `SerializationInfo` transmitted over the stream. ## Examples 下面的代码演示 如何使用方法显示包含在对象中的权限状态 。The following code shows the use of the method to display the permission state contained in the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了涉及检查的异常以外，此属性在安全异常中可能不包含相关数据 。This property might not contain relevant data in security exceptions other than exceptions involving checks for the .

member this.Method : System.Reflection.MethodInfo with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置关于与异常关联的方法的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the information about the method associated with the exception.

value.span: 一个描述方法的 对象。

span.span: A object describing the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-instance-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-instance-note.md)] 此属性包含以下项之一：This property contains one of the following: - 有关在触发异常的安全检查发生时，失败的程序集正在执行的方法的信息。Information about the method that the failed assembly was executing when the security check that triggered the exception occurred. - 有关 在调用堆栈上放置或安全操作的方法的信息，这是由于或导致的失败 。Information about the method that placed either a or security action on the call stack, in the case of a failure due to a or . - `null`，在无法为特定方法指定属性的情况下。`null`, in the case of a failure that is impossible to attribute to a specific method. 对象提供唯一标识该方法的方法名称、类名称和程序集名称信息。The object provides the method name, class name, and assembly name information that uniquely identifies the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置权限、权限集或权限集集合，它是导致安全检查失败的唯一允许堆栈帧的一部分。

span.span: Gets or sets the permission, permission set, or permission set collection that is part of the permit-only stack frame that caused a security check to fail.

value.span: 权限、权限集或权限集的集合对象。

span.span: A permission, permission set, or permission set collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示在导致安全异常的堆栈帧中包含的允许的权限、权限集或权限集集合。The property represents the permitted permission, permission set, or permission set collection contained in the stack frame that caused the security exception. 例如，当由于失败而发生安全异常时 ，允许的权限将出现在此属性中，并且要求 包含在属性中 。For instance, when a security exception occurs because of a failure, the permitted permission appears in this property and the demanded is contained in the property. 此属性的类型为， 因为权限、权限集或权限集的集合都可以要求并且 是它们的公共基类。This property is of type because permissions, permission sets, or permission set collections can all be demanded and is their common base class. 若要测试此属性的运行时类型，可以使用 方法或特定语言运算符，如 c # 中的 [is 运算符](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/is) 或 Visual Basic 中的 [TypeOf 运算符](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/typeof-operator) 。To test the run-time type of this property, you can use the method or a specific language operator, such as the [is operator](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/is) in C# or the [TypeOf operator](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/typeof-operator) in Visual Basic.
